channel.title: State Compressing on Supradax's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in State Compressing on Supradax's Blog

item.title: [Algorithm]Dynamic Programming: State Compressing
item.description: State Compressing, which indicates a way to depict different states relatively succintly, are widely applied to two sorts of typical problems: the existence of a certain element in a set and 2D DP Problems concerning connectivity.
